verses.verse: In <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> when there was a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> and they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3361>nothing<s%> <S%G5100><s%> to <S%G2068>eat,<s%> He <S%G4341>called<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them,

" I <S%G4697>feel<s%> <S%G4697>compassion<s%> for the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they have <S%G4357>remained<s%> with Me <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G5100><s%> to <S%G2068>eat;<s%>

and <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G630>send<s%> them <S%G630>away<s%> <S%G3523>hungry<s%> to their <S%G3624>home,<s%> they will <S%G1590>faint<s%> on the <S%G3598>way;<s%> and <S%G5100>some<s%> of them <S%G1510>have<s%> <S%G1510>come<s%> from a <S%G3113>distance.<s%> "

And His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> Him, <S%G4159>"Where<s%> will <S%G5100>anyone<s%> be <S%G1410>able<s%> to [find enough to] <S%G5526>satisfy<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>men<s%> with <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> in a <S%G2047>desolate<s%> <S%G2047>place<s%>?"
And He was <S%G2065>asking<s%> them, <S%G4214>"How<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> do you <S%G2192>have<s%>?" And they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2033>"Seven.<s%>"

And He <S%G3853>directed<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> to <S%G377>sit<s%> <S%G377>down<s%> on the <S%G1093>ground;<s%> and <S%G2983>taking<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G740>loaves,<s%> He <S%G2168>gave<s%> <S%G2168>thanks<s%> and <S%G2806>broke<s%> them, and started <S%G1325>giving<s%> them to His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G3908>serve<s%> to them, and they <S%G3908>served<s%> them to the <S%G3793>multitude.<s%>

They <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G3641>few<s%> <S%G2485>small<s%> <S%G2485>fish;<s%> and after He had <S%G2127>blessed<s%> them, He <S%G3004>ordered<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> to be <S%G3908>served<s%> as <S%G2532>well.<s%>

And they <S%G2068>ate<s%> and were <S%G5526>satisfied;<s%> and they <S%G142>picked<s%> up <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4711>large<s%> <S%G4711>baskets<s%> <S%G4051>full<s%> of <S%G4051>what<s%> was <S%G4051>left<s%> <S%G4051>over<s%> of the <S%G2801>broken<s%> <S%G2801>pieces.<s%>
And <S%G5613>about<s%> <S%G5070>four<s%> <S%G5070>thousand<s%> were [there;] and He <S%G630>sent<s%> them <S%G630>away.<s%>
And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> He <S%G1684>entered<s%> the <S%G4143>boat<s%> with His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G3313>district<s%> of <S%G1148>Dalmanutha.<s%>

And the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out and <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G4802>argue<s%> with Him, <S%G2212>seeking<s%> from Him a <S%G4592>sign<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> to <S%G3985>test<s%> Him.

And <S%G389>sighing<s%> <S%G389>deeply<s%> in His <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>"Why<s%> does <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> for a <S%G4592>sign<s%>? <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1487>no<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> shall be <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation.<s%>"
And <S%G863>leaving<s%> them, He <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1684>embarked<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side.<s%>

And they had <S%G1950>forgotten<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G740>bread;<s%> and did not <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1508>more<s%> <S%G1508>than<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G740>loaf<s%> in the <S%G4143>boat<s%> with them.

And He was <S%G1291>giving<s%> <S%G1291>orders<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3708>"Watch<s%> out! <S%G991>Beware<s%> of the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of <S%G2264>Herod.<s%>"
And they [began] to <S%G1260>discuss<s%> with <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> [the fact] that they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1097>aware<s%> of this, <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> do you <S%G1260>discuss<s%> [the fact] that you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>? Do you not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G3539>see<s%> <S%G3761>or<s%> <S%G4920>understand<s%>? Do you <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G4456>hardened<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%>?
<S%G2192>"Having<s%> <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> do you not <S%G991>see<s%>? And <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3775>ears,<s%> do you not <S%G191>hear<s%>? And do you not <S%G3421>remember,<s%>

<S%G3753>when<s%> I <S%G2806>broke<s%> the <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> for the <S%G4000>five<s%> <S%G4000>thousand,<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G2894>baskets<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G2801>broken<s%> <S%G2801>pieces<s%> you <S%G142>picked<s%> up?" They <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1427>"Twelve.<s%>"

"And <S%G3753>when<s%> [I broke] the <S%G2033>seven<s%> for the <S%G5070>four<s%> <S%G5070>thousand,<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G4711>large<s%> <S%G4711>baskets<s%> <S%G4138>full<s%> of <S%G2801>broken<s%> <S%G2801>pieces<s%> did you <S%G142>pick<s%> up?" And they <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2033>"Seven.<s%>"
And He was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, "Do you not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G4920>understand<s%>?"
And they <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G966>Bethsaida.<s%> And they <S%G5342>brought<s%> a <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5185>man<s%> to Him, and <S%G3870>entreated<s%> Him to <S%G681>touch<s%> him.

And <S%G1949>taking<s%> the <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5185>man<s%> by the <S%G5495>hand,<s%> He <S%G1627>brought<s%> him out of the <S%G2968>village;<s%> and after <S%G4429>spitting<s%> on his <S%G3659>eyes,<s%> and <S%G2007>laying<s%> His <S%G5495>hands<s%> upon him, He <S%G1905>asked<s%> him, "Do you <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%>?"

And he <S%G308>looked<s%> up and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> for I am <S%G3708>seeing<s%> [them] <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G1186>trees,<s%> <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G4043>about.<s%>"

<S%G1534>Then<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> He <S%G2007>laid<s%> His <S%G5495>hands<s%> upon his <S%G3788>eyes;<s%> and he <S%G1227>looked<s%> <S%G1227>intently<s%> and was <S%G600>restored,<s%> and [began] to <S%G1227>see<s%> <S%G537>everything<s%> <S%G5081>clearly.<s%>
And He <S%G649>sent<s%> him to his <S%G3624>home,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Do not <S%G3366>even<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> the <S%G2968>village.<s%>"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out, <S%G2532>along<s%> with His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> to the <S%G2968>villages<s%> of <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%> <S%G5376>Philippi;<s%> and on the <S%G3598>way<s%> He <S%G1905>questioned<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Who<s%> do <S%G444>people<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> that I <S%G1510>am<s%>?"

And they <S%G3004>told<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2491>"John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist;<s%> and <S%G243>others<s%> [say] <S%G2243>Elijah;<s%> but <S%G243>others,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets.<s%>"

And He [continued] by <S%G1905>questioning<s%> them, "But <S%G5101>who<s%> do you <S%G3004>say<s%> that I <S%G1510>am<s%>?" <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "Thou <S%G1510>art<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>"
And He <S%G2008>warned<s%> them to <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> Him.

And He <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> them that the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4183>things<s%> and be <S%G593>rejected<s%> by the <S%G4245>elders<s%> and the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> and be <S%G615>killed,<s%> and <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G450>again.<s%>
And He was <S%G2980>stating<s%> the <S%G3056>matter<s%> <S%G3954>plainly.<s%> And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G4355>took<s%> Him <S%G4355>aside<s%> and <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> Him.

But <S%G1994>turning<s%> <S%G1994>around<s%> and <S%G3708>seeing<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> He <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5217>"Get<s%> <S%G3694>behind<s%> Me, <S%G4567>Satan;<s%> for you are not <S%G5426>setting<s%> your <S%G5426>mind<s%> on God's interests, but man's."

And He <S%G4341>summoned<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> with His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2309>wishes<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> Me, let him <S%G533>deny<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and <S%G142>take<s%> up his <S%G4716>cross,<s%> and <S%G190>follow<s%> Me.

"For <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G2309>wishes<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> shall <S%G622>lose<s%> it; but <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G622>loses<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> for My <S%G1752>sake<s%> and the gospel's shall <S%G4982>save<s%> it.
"For <S%G5101>what<s%> does it <S%G5623>profit<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> to <S%G2770>gain<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> and <S%G2210>forfeit<s%> his <S%G5590>soul<s%>?
"For <S%G5101>what<s%> shall a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> in <S%G465>exchange<s%> for his <S%G5590>soul<s%>?

"For <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> is <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> of Me and My <S%G3056>words<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3428>adulterous<s%> and <S%G268>sinful<s%> <S%G1074>generation,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> will <S%G2532>also<s%> be <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> of him <S%G3752>when<s%> He <S%G2064>comes<s%> in the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of His <S%G3962>Father<s%> with the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G32>angels.<s%>"
